participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, with a passion for art and craftsmanship.
participant_1.background: I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists. I am a healthy person, except for my love of milk. My father was a cook. Through them I have learned to make up myself and others. I was a librarian, but I lost my job because I was always forgetting where I put things.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and family-oriented, with a strong love for nature and creativity.
participant_2.background: I've been fortunate to have a close-knit family my whole life. I sometimes lose track of my surroundings when I'm riding my horse, which can be dangerous. I like to surf. My family is my biggest treasure. I am an Asian-American who loves to grow my own vegetables and spend time with my two brothers.

content.text: I'm well, thanks! I'm an upholsterer and I'm proud of my work. How about you?
I'm good! I love to surf and I'm an Asian-American who loves to grow my own vegetables and spend time with my two brothers. What's your favorite part about your job?
My favorite part about my job is working with comic book artists. It's really cool to be able to see my work come to life on the pages of a comic book.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to be a comic book artist, but I'm not very artistic.
It's definitely not too late to learn! There are a lot of great resources available online.
Maybe I'll look into it! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer. I love my job, but it can be a lot of work.
That sounds like a challenging job!
It can be, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. We go on a lot of hikes together.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
It is! I also love to go surfing.
That sounds really cool! I've never been surfing before.
You should try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that! Thanks for the suggestion!
